name: 米莱娜·康斯坦丁诺娃
name_full: 米莱娜·康斯坦丁诺娃 Milena Konstantinova
introduction: Milena Konstantinova has decided to become an actress at the age of 5 and has been pursuing her dream ever since. Milena is constantly learning and improving her skills. She attends a drama club at the Art School, participates in the Ballet Preparatory Course at the National Theatre, and is involved in dance, sports, and many other activities that help develop her talent. She is not afraid of any work in front of the camera and always looks forward to new filming opportunities.
